concept.title: Structured input and output
concept.shortdesc: If you have a task that has many options, returns a lot of information, or is part of a task plan, consider using structured input and output with your task.

conbody.p: The task API is based on JSON. Task parameters are encoded in JSON, and the task runner attempts to parse the output of the tasks as a JSON object.
The task runner can inject keys into that object, prefixed with _. If the task does not return a JSON object, the task runner creates one and places the output in an _output key.
